Name: The Blind Side
Ingredients: 30 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of gently squeeze lemon wedge over drink and then drop into drink..
Review: Fresh and refreshing – a minty gentian apéritif.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2016 by Riccardo Aletta (AKA 'Ricky D Wing') at Holy Birds in London, England.
